current_offers.short_description: Join Australian Unity on a combined cover and Australian Unity will waive the 2 and 6 month waiting periods on extras.
current_offers.terms:
• Offer available to new members who join Australian Unity between the 1/10/2016 and the 31/10/16
  • The offer is only available with the purchase of a combination cover or a Hospital cover with Extras cover. Excludes Extras only cover, and Overseas Visitor Cover.
  • All two month waiting periods plus the six-month optical waiting period will be waived.
  • Waiting periods still apply to wisdom teeth extractions, periodontics and endodontics.
  • This offer is made and executed by Australian Unity

current_offers.short_description: Join Frank on combined cover by 31 October and Frank will skip the 2 and 6 month waits on extras.
current_offers.full_description: Frank will give you 6 weeks free when you take out combined hospital and extras cover or a Frank bundle by 31 October 2016. Join now, pay your first month and you’ll get the following 6 weeks free
current_offers.terms:
Available to new members until 31 October 2016.

Must pay the first month to get 6 weeks free.

This offer is made and executed by Frank Health Insurance.

current_offers.short_description: Join on a combined hospital and extras cover by 31 October and GMHBA will waive all extras waiting periods.
current_offers.terms:
• For new members/memberships.
  • This offer does not apply to current GMHBA members.
  • Members must pay via direct debit.
  • To be eligible for the offer, members must join combined hospital and extras cover.
  • Bronze products are included in this offer.
  • Members must pay their first month and will have waiting periods waived
  • This offer is made and executed by GMHBA Limited.

current_offers.short_description: Join HBF on combined cover or extras only by 31 October and HBF will waive all 2 month waiting periods.
current_offers.terms:
Available on combined covers and on extras only.

This offer is made and executed by HBF.

current_offers.short_description: Join Peoplecare on hospital cover or combined cover by 31 October and Peoplecare will give you a $100 gift card.
current_offers.terms:
• This offer is for new members only who purchase a hospital only or hospital and extras cover.
  • Members who purchase Extras or Ambulance only covers are not eligible for the Gift Card.
  • This offer is current as at 1 September 2016, and can be altered or withdrawn at any time.
  • Peoplecare reserves the right to change the offer conditions at any time without notice.
  • This offer is applied to purchases by new members either through the Peoplecare website/call centre or Members Own Health Funds. It is not available through any other intermediary.
  • This offer is not available with any other promotional offers being run by Peoplecare at the same time. 
  • All Gift Cards will be delivered by post to the address nominated by the member. Peoplecare are not liable for any damaged, undelivered, lost or stolen Gift Cards and no replacement gift cards will be provided in the event of damage to, non-delivery of, or theft of a Gift Card. Allow 8-9 weeks after the purchase date of the new policy for delivery of the Gift Card.
  • Gift cards are subject to the terms and conditions of the gift card issuer. These conditions can be viewed at https://rewardscometrue.com.au/.
  • This offer is made and executed by Peoplecare.

current_offers.short_description: Join rt Health before October 31 to go into rt Health’s draw for a $1,000 Bunnings gift card.
current_offers.terms:
Available for new members.

This offer is made and executed by rt health.

current_offers.short_description: Join Teachers Health on combined cover before September 30 and Teachers Health will give you 6 weeks free
current_offers.terms:
New members only, combined cover must pay first month.

This offer is made and executed by Teachers Health.
